s'weak schwach

causative 𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓐎 𓅪 | weak | schwach < spacken? 𓋴 𓐟 𓄿 𓐎 𓅪 𓂝 𓏤 | the weak of arm, weak man | Speier speien ++ DE / Spacker Spacken

nichtig

𓎼 𓂜 𓈖 𓀉 | weak | 𓈖 𓂜 𓎼 𓀉 nõrk ohnmächtig 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓅱 𓅪 𓏥 | weakness | √nichtig <> Nässer? 𓈖 𓍇 𓏌 𓏲 𓀔 | be weak | nahhala : be thin AR ++ / nahhil : thin, emaciated 𓄣 𓏤 𓆑 𓎔 𓎛 𓈗 | weak in action | 𓎔 𓎛 𓈗 nõrk
